description.p: The Prosilica GigE Linux SDK allows users to control and capture images from Prosilica's GigE Vision gigabit Ethernet cameras. The ROS package automatically downloads and extracts a tarball, installs headers and libraries, and builds a few useful example programs.

We currently use version 1.20 of the SDK, released 7 April 2009. It is known to work with version 1.36 of the Prosilica GigE Vision camera firmware. We will update the version for bugfixes and for new features we deem particularly useful to vision applications.
